name: Star Merchant (itch)
description:
Star Merchant has you collecting stars to become wealthy! Spend your gathered stars on upgrades after each stage to help collect more. Collect as many stars as possible by the end of 5 stages!

CONTROLS Hold Left Click and DragMove the net around and catch stars.SpaceUse the Star Spawn Booster upgrade (after you've unlocked it).
Click ButtonsUnlock upgrades or progress through the game.
DETAILS

This game was made in just under 3 hours and is my submission to Trijam #86 (my first game jam!) with the theme of Stars. The visuals were created using Adobe Illustrator, the sound effects were created with the software Bfxr, and the wonderful background music is from www.bensound.com.
